name: Roulette ACT
description:
Roulette's Analyzer, Counting and Tracker

“Reveal Hidden Numbers”

Use this app to reveal hidden numbers behind roulette rounds.
It has a simple arrangement for easy of use, so you can develop your own strategy to win.
Beat the house edge, because we can decide when and how much to bet, and "the rest is just luck".
This app does not guarantee to make you win, please play with responsible.
We set the default track statistic history rounds for:
- Cold numbers, hot numbers, black - red, even - odd, small - big for 200 rounds
- Dozen's hot numbers for 25 rounds
- Six line's hot numbers for 75 rounds
